content:
I'm glad I could help.

It's great that you're considering checking out reviews and comparing prices for the Sigma 24mm f/2.8 DN Contemporary. That's always a smart move before making a purchase. You can find plenty of reviews and comparisons online, including on websites like B&H Photo, Amazon, and other photography forums.

And wow, that's a great memory you have of buying your Canon EOS 80D camera from B&H Photo in New York City! It's always exciting to get a new camera, and it's even more special when you have a memorable experience associated with it. The Canon EOS 80D is a great camera, and I'm sure you'll enjoy using it with the new lens.

If you have any more questions or need further recommendations, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you find the perfect lens for your needs, and I'm sure you'll take some amazing photos with it!

Happy shopping, and happy shooting!
